articles.content:
New branding, new chassis design, and some new internals
HPs new Omen 25L (left) and the 30L
HP
HP has debuted a fresh lineup of Omen desktops, the 25L and 30L, with improved specs and a clean new design that ditches the edgy gamer aesthetic for something … [+2798 chars]

articles.author: Mike Brown
articles.title: SpaceX Starship: incredible Elon Musk photo shows the rocket’s true size - Inverse
articles.description: The giant ship has been captured in an image that demonstrates the scale of the Mars-bound ship.
articles.content:
The Starship, SpaceX's under-development ship for sending humans to Mars, has been captured in a new image that reveals its sheer size.
Ahead of a planned static test fire, CEO Elon Musk shared an image on Twitter Monday of the underside of the rocket, with … [+3581 chars]

articles.title: NVIDIA's mid-range GeForce RTX 3060 could beat flagship RTX 2080 Ti - TweakTown
articles.description: Ampere is going to be nuts, but a GeForce RTX 3060 that beats a $1200 card? Wow
articles.content: The last few days have been pretty crazy in the GPU world, with purported specs on NVIDIA's upcoming Ampere-based GeForce RTX 3080 Ti blowing us away -- and then Intel with its "Father of All" GPUs in the Xe-HP. In the middle of all of this, the diamond-in-th… [+4296 chars]

articles.title: As Microsoft touts Teams growth, Slack CEO says it's not a competitor - ZDNet
articles.description: Slack's CEO says Microsoft ought to be a little frustrated with the growth of Microsoft Teams.
articles.content:
As Microsoft last week revealed that its Teams collaboration platform now has more than 75 million daily active users, Stewart Butterfield, CEO of Slack, denied that Teams is even a competitor. 
"What we've seen over the past couple of months is that Teams i… [+3070 chars]

articles.title: Why 5G will give the iPhone 12 an advantage over every Android phone - Macworld
articles.description: Apple is set to launch an all-5G lineup with the iPhone 12, but if you were prepared for a price hike, you're in for a pleasant surprise.
articles.content: Even though the iPhone 12 might not arrive until jack-o-lanterns start appearing on peoples doorsteps, we already know an awful lot about Apples plans. Most notably, there will reportedly be four iPhone models for the first time, with a new 5.4-inch model opt… [+5637 chars]

articles.title: Valve are cutting off SteamVR support for Macs - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Valve are ending VR support for MacOS, so they can “focus on Windows and Linux”. Mackers can still access legacy builds, no more bug-quashing.
articles.content: If you bought a VR kit for your Mac and planned on using SteamVR, then you are out of luck. Valve are ending VR support for MacOS, so they can “focus on Windows and Linux”. Mackers can still access legacy builds, but this means no more improvements, and no mo… [+1129 chars]

articles.title: Airbus to deploy 'game-changing' bomb-sniffing sensors at airports - Engadget
articles.description: Airbus plans to test an “electronic nose” device that uses biological cells to mimic what bomb-sniffing dogs can do, reports the Financial Times. The company will deploy jellyfish-shaped sensors, developed by Silicon Valley startup Koniku, in several airport …
articles.content: In light of the COVID-19 pandemic, the companies are also looking into ways to detect biological hazards like contagious viruses. Koniku has touted security as well as medical applications, with sniffers that can detect signs of cancer — in much the same way … [+644 chars]
